title: Please Update Pulsfire Ezreal!
body: Ezreal looks like he belongs in a museum who else agrees with me? and if you don't why?

replies.body: PFE looks like a 1350 skin and SGU looks like an 1820 skin tbh.

SGU is basically the Udyr visual update, but Riot being the stingy company they are they make it an ultimate skin instead, funny cause at the time pretty much everyone was asking for an Udyr visual update cause his skins were so bad, everyone expected a big visual update but we got nothing instead we got a $30 skin, then what was it like a year later when they finally gave Udyr a visual update? And it barely changed anything.

Agree. The new udyr skin [at least I think it's udyr...] looks nice, but with his old pixel particles I consider it overall a "meh" skin. If I could use my SGU particles with it, then it would be a great skin.

I would also like to know why there are just splash skins for Ez, no particle changes for PFE, or no updates on the PFE skin in general. Also just like to add, what about updating his lore? I want to know more! :) Please explain.

Pulsefire ezreal is like mecha anime.













Shit.
wow how long did you wait to make that shit joke?
